title: S&T Bancorp, Inc. (NASDAQ:STBA) Analyst Rating in Focus
text:
Home » Analyst Views »   Analyst Rating in Focus   Analyst Rating in Focus on August 20, 2015 
  shares have been given a 2.8 rating by analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research. Sell-side firms often use different terminology for their ratings so this scale provides a simple consensus number. The ratings are calculated on a 1 to 5 scale where 1 represents a Strong Buy and 5 a Strong Sell. When analysts were polled three months ago, the stock had an average rating of 2.8. 
Sell-Side brokerage firms have a price target of $31.666 on shares of  . This is based on analysts one year projections on the stock. The most bearish analyst outlook has a price target of $31, while the most aggressive firm sees the stock reaching $32 within the year. 
Earnings Glance 
Investors will be marking 2015-10-27 on their calendars as this is when S&T Bancorp, Inc. is slated to next issue their quarterly earnings. Analysts surveyed by Zacks are anticipating earnings of $0.58 per share for the period closing on 2015-09-30. This is the Zacks consensus number based on 3 Wall Street analysts covering the equity. Looking ahead longer term, the Sell-Siders have tagged the stock with expected earnings of $N/A. This is the best estimate for both sales and earnings over the next 3-5 years, as calculated by Zacks. 
For the most recent quarter, S&T Bancorp, Inc. announced earnings per share of $0.52 for the fiscal period ending on 2015-06-30. The actual number was $0.03 away from what analysts had expected, or a 6.12% surprise factor.
